definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The diamond is of the highest color grading for a white diamond and clarity ranking.
sentences.chinese: 这颗钻石具有白钻石最高的颜色评级和净度。

sentences.english: The diamond is of the highest color grading for a white diamond and clarity ranking.
sentences.chinese: 这颗钻石具有白钻石最高的颜色评级和净度。

sentences.english: A diamond on a dunghill is a precious diamond still.
sentences.chinese: 粪堆上的钻石仍然是珍贵的钻石。

sentences.english: A diamond on a dunghill is a precious diamond still.
sentences.chinese: 粪堆上的钻石仍然是珍贵的钻石。

sentences.english: Phet reached its greatest intensity off the coast of Oman on June 3.
sentences.chinese: 6月3日，“钻石”在阿曼沿海达到最大强度。

sentences.english: B A small rose-cut diamond or single-cut melee.
sentences.chinese: 二小玫瑰切割钻石或单减混战。

sentences.english: Hope and courage are two bright diamonds in the crown of success.
sentences.chinese: 指望战英勇是胜利之冕下两颗敞亮的钻石。

sentences.english: Snow is a mineral, just like diamonds and salt.
sentences.chinese: 雪是一种矿物，就像钻石和盐一样。

sentences.english: Diamonds in Liberia are still traded to support wars.
sentences.chinese: 赖比瑞亚的钻石仍旧被拿去贩卖用来支持战争。

sentences.english: The blue-white brilliants are the stones of the "finest water" .
sentences.chinese: 兰白色的宝石是光泽度最好的钻石。

sentences.english: Swiss company could make diamond from human bone-ash through its special techs.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士一家公司通过特殊技术可将骨灰制成钻石。

sentences.english: A cut diamond has many faces.
sentences.chinese: 经切割的钻石有很多晶面。

sentences.english: Opt for stud earrings or single bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 选择钻石耳环或者单手镯。

sentences.english: The seventh Diamond League meeting of the year took place in Lausanne, Switzerland on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 今年钻石联赛的第七站比赛周四在瑞士的洛桑举行。

sentences.english: But I bought last year for my girlfriend a very nice diamond ring.
sentences.chinese: 但我去年给我女朋友买了一个很漂亮的钻石戒指。

sentences.english: Dazzle her with these one of a kind sapphire and diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: 这款精致炫目的蓝宝石钻石耳环一定令她惊喜不已。

definition: small diamonds/melee (small diamonds used in embellishing mountings for larger gems)/splints (sharp-pointed diamond splinters)/clatersal (small diamond splints from which diamond powder is produced by crushing)
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
